duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the development of systems engineering processes for major C4I systems and evolve them with advanced technology solutions.
Translate real-world needs into technical specifications and design and develop systems engineering processes.
Broaden skillset into areas like tactical networks and cybersecurity to create effective systems engineering processes for Navy systems.
Write effective systems engineering plans and lead teams of engineers in the development of these plans.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.
Foster collaboration and guide the efforts of marketing specialists towards achieving set goals.
Plan and oversee participation in industry events, conferences, and trade shows to showcase services and network with potential clients.
Measure and report on the performance of marketing campaigns, using data-driven insights to continuously improve strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Computer Science, Mathematics, Cybersecurity, or Physical Science (Master's degree in Systems Engineering preferred)
